pr_title: HIVE-24332: Make AbstractSerDe Superclass of all SerDes

timeline.bodyText: Nit: please rename tt_desc so that it follows the java naming conventions.
timeline.author: miklosgergely
miklosgergely

timeline.bodyText: Please call the variable serDe, and the function getSerDeClass, to be consistent with TableDesc.
timeline.author: miklosgergely

timeline.bodyText: I suggest to call it inputKeySerDe, and it can be created under this name, no need to call it serde for an interim time.
timeline.author: miklosgergely

replies.bodyText: Done.  I had it this way because inputKeyDeserializer is a Deserializer class which does not have an 'initialize' method.  However, I change the type to be AbstractSerDe to address your comments here.
replies.author: belugabehr
